I am a PhD student in [Bioinformatics and Systems Biology at UC San Diego](https://bioinformatics.ucsd.edu/) 
where I am studying the activity LINE-1 and other retrotransposons in the human brain 
with professors [Rusty Gage](https://www.salk.edu/scientist/rusty-gage/) and [Eran Mukamel](https://cogsci.ucsd.edu/people/faculty/eran-mukamel.html).
